Speed up your design workflow!
Identify fonts from any website
-----------------
Features :
- When hovering, the Font name in use will be displayed.
- Left-clicking will display Font information including: Font Family, Font Weight, Font Size, Lineheight, Font color (RBG and HEX), Font Style.
- Button to quickly copy hex color codes
- The background color of the information panel will change to match the color of the font being used
- Press the Esc button on the keyboard or the Close button on the screen to exit the function

Note: Please reload the web page after installing the extension
